leaf_cluster_name: 地球科学-遥感与地理空间生态
task_chain: 预处理→检测/分割→变化检测→评测
tool_form: GIS工具 + CV框架 + 数据集

tools.name: tile-cutter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to cut images into map tiles using the pyramid model
tools.detailed_description: A utility to cut large images into small tiles based on the pyramid model, supporting Web Mercator and Latitude/Longitude projections for map display.

tools.name: fisheye_lidar_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Calibration method for fisheye camera and LIDAR coordinate transformation
tools.detailed_description: Implements a method to calibrate the extrinsic parameters and coordinate transformation between a fisheye camera and a LIDAR sensor, useful for multi-sensor fusion.

tools.name: PySUS
tools.one_line_profile: Library to access and analyze Brazilian public health (SUS) data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to download, clean, and analyze openly available datasets from the Brazilian Unified Health System (SUS), facilitating epidemiological research.

tools.name: MapTilesDownloader
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to download map tiles from various providers
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for downloading map tiles from tile servers, useful for creating offline maps or acquiring raster data for analysis.

tools.name: geojson-regions
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to create simplified GeoJSON regions for visualization
tools.detailed_description: A repository and utility for generating simplified GeoJSON region boundaries, optimizing map-based visualizations by reducing data complexity.

tools.name: VoltRon
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial omic analysis toolbox for multi-resolution integration
tools.detailed_description: A spatial omic analysis toolbox designed for multi-resolution and multi-omic integration using image registration techniques, enabling advanced biological spatial analysis.

tools.name: BruTile
tools.one_line_profile: .NET library to access tile services
tools.detailed_description: A generic .NET library for accessing tile services such as OpenStreetMap, MapBox, and others, facilitating the integration of tiled map data into applications.

tools.name: Spatial-Allocator
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for generating spatial surrogates and processing emissions data
tools.detailed_description: A set of geospatial tools (Vector, Raster, Surrogate) developed by CMAS Center for processing and allocating emissions and meteorological data for environmental modeling.

tools.name: Windshaft
tools.one_line_profile: Map tile library for PostGIS and Torque.js
tools.detailed_description: A Node.js map tile library that renders tiles from PostGIS data and supports CartoCSS styling, serving as a backend component for geospatial visualization platforms.

tools.name: CesiumJS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source JavaScript library for 3D globes and maps
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive JavaScript library for creating world-class 3D globes and maps with high performance, widely used for geospatial data visualization and analysis in web environments.

tools.name: geostan
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian spatial analysis library for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for Bayesian spatial analysis, providing tools for spatial regression, disease mapping, and exploratory spatial data analysis using Stan.

tools.name: terracotta
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight XYZ tile server for raster data
tools.detailed_description: A versatile tile server built with Flask and Rasterio that serves raster data as XYZ tiles, enabling easy visualization of scientific datasets in web maps.

tools.name: Building-Regulariser
tools.one_line_profile: Library for cleaning and regularising building footprints
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to clean and regularize building footprint polygons in geospatial data, aligning edges and simplifying geometries for better analysis accuracy.

tools.name: OmniCloudMask
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud and cloud shadow segmentation for satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for fast and accurate segmentation of clouds and cloud shadows in satellite imagery, essential for preprocessing remote sensing data.

tools.name: H3-Pandas
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of H3 spatial indexing with GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: A library that integrates Uber's H3 hexagonal hierarchical spatial indexing system with Pandas and GeoPandas, facilitating efficient spatial data handling and analysis.

tools.name: Tools_for_ArcGIS_Pro
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Python tools and samples for ArcGIS Pro
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing Python code samples and custom toolboxes for ArcGIS Pro, providing reusable scripts for various GIS tasks.

tools.name: PointCloudRasterizers.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library to process LiDAR scans into raster images
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package developed by Deltares for processing airborne laser scan (LiDAR) point clouds into raster images, supporting efficient geospatial data conversion.

tools.name: geojson-rbush
tools.one_line_profile: GeoJSON implementation of RBush spatial index
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance JavaScript library implementing RBush (R-tree based spatial index) specifically for GeoJSON data, enabling fast spatial queries.

tools.name: SSGP-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for filling gaps in spatial datasets
tools.detailed_description: Simple Spatial Gapfilling Processor (SSGP) is a toolbox designed to fill gaps in spatial datasets, such as remote sensing imagery, improving data completeness for analysis.

tools.name: RVGP
tools.one_line_profile: Generalised Gaussian process method for learning vector fields over non-Euclidean domains
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of a generalised Gaussian process method designed to learn vector fields on non-Euclidean domains, such as cortical surfaces in EEG data analysis. It allows for the regularization of vector fields using global structural information.

tools.name: eodal
tools.one_line_profile: Earth Observation Data Analysis Library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis of Earth Observation (EO) data, providing tools for handling and processing satellite imagery and related geospatial datasets.

tools.name: clj-gdal
tools.one_line_profile: Clojure-idiomatic GDAL wrapper
tools.detailed_description: A Clojure wrapper for the GDAL library, enabling geospatial data abstraction and processing within the Clojure programming environment. Developed by Element84, a key player in geospatial software.

tools.name: GIS-Tools-By-Electron
tools.one_line_profile: Desktop 3D GIS toolbox built with Electron
tools.detailed_description: A desktop application providing a suite of 3D GIS tools, built using the Electron framework. It offers functionalities for visualizing and processing geospatial data in a 3D environment.

tools.name: geojson-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for converting between GeoJSON and other JSON formats
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library providing utilities to convert between standard GeoJSON and other JSON-based geospatial formats (like ArcGIS JSON), facilitating data interoperability in web mapping and GIS applications.

tools.name: geometry-api-java
tools.one_line_profile: Esri Geometry API for Java for spatial data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Java API enabling developers to write custom applications for the analysis of spatial data. It is used in Esri GIS Tools for Hadoop and other third-party data processing solutions for geometric operations.

tools.name: gis-tools-for-hadoop
tools.one_line_profile: GIS tools for spatial analysis of big data on Hadoop
tools.detailed_description: A collection of GIS tools designed to enable spatial analysis of big data within the Hadoop ecosystem, bridging the gap between traditional GIS and big data processing frameworks.

tools.name: raster-deep-learning
tools.one_line_profile: ArcGIS Python raster functions for deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A set of built-in Python raster functions for ArcGIS designed to facilitate deep learning workflows on raster data, enabling tasks such as image classification and object detection.

tools.name: raster-functions
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight tools for on-the-fly image processing and raster analysis
tools.detailed_description: A curated set of Python-based tools for performing on-the-fly image processing and raster analysis within the ArcGIS environment, supporting various remote sensing tasks.

tools.name: spatial-framework-for-hadoop
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for spatial data analysis on Hadoop
tools.detailed_description: A framework that allows developers and data scientists to leverage the Hadoop data processing system for spatial data analysis, providing necessary types and functions for Hive and other Hadoop components.

tools.name: ArcGIS-Sentinel2-Download-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Search & Download of Sentinel-2 data
tools.detailed_description: An ArcGIS Python Toolbox designed to search and download Sentinel-2 satellite data (L1C/TOA, L2A/BOA) via the Copernicus Open Access Hub (DHuS) or CODE-DE.

tools.name: WKTPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for well-known-text strings and shapely geometries
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for visualizing Well-Known Text (WKT) strings and Shapely geometries. It serves as a utility for debugging and inspecting geometric data in geospatial workflows.

tools.name: ArcGIS2Mapbox
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to transfer shapefiles to Mapbox using tippecanoe
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility to facilitate the transfer of geospatial data from Shapefile format to Mapbox, utilizing tippecanoe for vector tile generation. Developed by GISupportICRC.

tools.name: GMT.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Generic Mapping Tools Library Wrapper for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia wrapper for the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT), a widely used open-source collection of tools for manipulating geographic and Cartesian data sets and producing high-quality illustrations.

tools.name: RemoteS.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing data processing library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library dedicated to remote sensing data processing, providing functionalities for handling and analyzing satellite imagery and related geospatial data.

tools.name: GeoDa
tools.one_line_profile: Software for spatial data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A free and open-source software tool that serves as an introduction to spatial data analysis. It provides a user-friendly interface for exploratory spatial data analysis (ESDA) and spatial modeling.

tools.name: rgeoda
tools.one_line_profile: R library for spatial data analysis based on libgeoda
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides spatial data analysis functionalities based on the libgeoda library, bringing GeoDa's spatial statistics capabilities to the R environment.

tools.name: geoblaze
tools.one_line_profile: Blazing Fast JavaScript Raster Processing Engine
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for performing raster analysis in the browser or Node.js. It allows for arithmetic, statistics, and other processing operations on raster data (like GeoTIFFs) without a backend.

tools.name: geotiff.io
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for viewing and analyzing GeoTIFFs in the browser
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool (and source code) for visualizing and performing lightweight analysis on GeoTIFF files directly in the browser, leveraging client-side processing capabilities.

tools.name: GeoWebCache
tools.one_line_profile: Java-based tile caching server for GIS services
tools.detailed_description: A tile caching server implemented in Java that accelerates the delivery of map tiles from WMS services. It supports various protocols like WMS-C, TMS, and WMTS, acting as a critical infrastructure component for geospatial data serving.

tools.name: mapbox-3dtiles
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Tiles implementation using Mapbox GL JS
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables the rendering of OGC 3D Tiles within Mapbox GL JS applications, extending Mapbox's capabilities to support standard 3D geospatial data formats.

tools.name: PyRate
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for estimating velocity and time-series from InSAR data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool developed by Geoscience Australia for processing Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) data to estimate ground displacement velocity and time-series.

tools.name: dea-cogger
tools.one_line_profile: Convert NetCDFs to Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs
tools.detailed_description: A utility from Geoscience Australia to convert NetCDF files into Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COG), facilitating efficient cloud-based geospatial data access and processing.

tools.name: giswater
tools.one_line_profile: Software for water cycle management using open source tools
tools.detailed_description: Open-source software focused on the management of the water cycle (water supply, sewerage, drainage) integrating with GIS tools like QGIS and PostgreSQL/PostGIS.

tools.name: geoutils
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of georeferenced rasters, vectors and point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for handling and analyzing georeferenced data (rasters, vectors, point clouds), designed to simplify common geospatial operations in scientific workflows, particularly in glaciology.

tools.name: Gogeo
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid spatial analysis of large-scale vector data in Go
tools.detailed_description: A Go-based library designed for high-concurrency spatial analysis of large-scale vector data, leveraging the GDAL library for underlying geospatial operations.

tools.name: pRPL
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Raster Processing Library
tools.detailed_description: An MPI-enabled C++ library that provides interfaces to parallelize raster and image processing algorithms, designed for high-performance spatial computing.

tools.name: digital-elevation-model
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to transform, project, visualize, and read Digital Elevation Models
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for processing Digital Elevation Models (DEMs), including functions for transformation, projection, visualization, and reading formats like ASTERGDEM and EUDEM.

tools.name: odeon
tools.one_line_profile: Task-agnostic framework for deep learning applied to remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework developed by IGN (French National Geographic Institute) specifically for remote sensing applications, designed to be task-agnostic and flexible.

tools.name: ITK-Wasm
tools.one_line_profile: High performance spatial analysis in a web browser using ITK
tools.detailed_description: A framework bringing the Insight Toolkit (ITK) to the web via WebAssembly, enabling high-performance spatial and medical image analysis directly in the browser and across languages.

tools.name: flight_planner
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin for planning photogrammetric flights
tools.detailed_description: A QGIS plugin designed to assist in planning photogrammetric flights, calculating parameters like projection centers, image coverage, and GSD maps.

tools.name: Geographical-Gaussian-Process-Regression
tools.one_line_profile: Geographical Gaussian Process Regression (GGPR) model for spatial prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Geographical Gaussian Process Regression (GGPR) model, designed for spatial prediction and exploratory spatial data analysis in geographical sciences.

tools.name: GDAL.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the GDAL geospatial library
tools.detailed_description: A thin Julia wrapper for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL), enabling reading and writing of raster and vector geospatial data formats within the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: GeoJSON.jl
tools.one_line_profile: GeoJSON data handling utilities for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing utilities for parsing, generating, and working with GeoJSON data, facilitating integration of web-standard geospatial data into scientific workflows.

tools.name: CoordinateTransformations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Coordinate transformation library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for performing coordinate transformations, essential for geometry processing and spatial data alignment in scientific computing.

tools.name: RasterSmith
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing tool for NASA Earth observing satellite data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to preprocess various NASA Earth observing satellite data products into common resolutions, spatial references, and formats to facilitate cross-sensor analysis.

tools.name: index-cpp
tools.one_line_profile: C++ spatial indexing implementations including Hilbert-curve geohash
tools.detailed_description: C++ implementations of efficient indexing mechanisms, specifically featuring a Hilbert-curve geohash based spatial index, suitable for high-performance spatial data retrieval.

tools.name: lftools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for cartography, surveying, and spatial analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for cartographic production, surveying tasks, digital image processing, and general spatial analysis.

tools.name: PhaseWare
tools.one_line_profile: Phase map retrieval for fringe projection profilometry
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for phase map retrieval in fringe projection profilometry and off-axis digital holographic interferometry, used in optical metrology and imaging.

tools.name: iCGIS
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight GIS desktop application
tools.detailed_description: A simple Geographic Information System (GIS) program built with Qt, OpenGL, and GDAL, providing visualization and basic processing capabilities for geospatial data.

tools.name: RSMI
tools.one_line_profile: Recursive Spatial Model Index implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Recursive Spatial Model Index, a learned spatial index structure for efficient spatial query processing.

tools.name: nichecompass
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end analysis of spatial multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the end-to-end analysis of spatial multi-omics data, enabling the study of cellular niches and spatial organization in biological tissues.

tools.name: plateau-gis-converter
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for PLATEAU 3D city models to geospatial formats
tools.detailed_description: A tool for converting PLATEAU's CityGML 3D city models into various geospatial formats such as 3D Tiles, MVT, and GeoPackage for visualization and analysis.

tools.name: Marlu
tools.one_line_profile: Coordinate transformations and Jones matrices for MWA Telescope
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library providing coordinate transformations and Jones matrix calculations specifically for the Murchison Widefield Array (MWA) radio telescope data analysis.

tools.name: kdbush
tools.one_line_profile: Fast static spatial index for 2D points in Go
tools.detailed_description: A Go port of kdbush, providing a very fast static spatial index for 2D points, useful for spatial queries and range searches in geospatial applications.

tools.name: MapServer
tools.one_line_profile: Open source platform for publishing spatial data to the web
tools.detailed_description: A major open-source development environment for building spatially-enabled internet applications, capable of rendering maps and serving geospatial data via OGC standards.

tools.name: gdal.netcore
tools.one_line_profile: GDAL bindings for .NET applications
tools.detailed_description: A library providing GDAL 3.x bindings for C# and F#, enabling .NET applications to perform advanced geospatial data processing and format conversion.

tools.name: db-sync
tools.one_line_profile: Synchronization tool for Mergin Maps and PostGIS
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to facilitate two-way synchronization of geospatial data between the Mergin Maps mobile collection platform and a PostGIS database, supporting field data collection workflows.

tools.name: geodiff
tools.one_line_profile: Library for handling diffs of geospatial data
tools.detailed_description: A library for computing and applying differences (diffs) between geospatial datasets, essential for version control and synchronization of GIS data.

tools.name: horde-ad
tools.one_line_profile: Higher Order Reverse Derivatives Efficiently - AD library
tools.detailed_description: A Haskell library for efficient higher-order reverse-mode automatic differentiation, applicable in scientific modeling, machine learning, and optimization tasks.

tools.name: pyMeteo
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for meteorological data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library containing tools and functions for processing, analyzing, and visualizing meteorological and atmospheric science data.

tools.name: POPP
tools.one_line_profile: Palm Oil Plantation Predictor
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool developed by NASA DEVELOP to automate the downloading, atmospheric correction, and processing of raster data to identify potential palm oil plantations.

tools.name: WebWorldWind
tools.one_line_profile: NASA WorldWind Javascript SDK for 3D globes
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript SDK by NASA for creating geo-browser web applications and embedding 3D virtual globes in web pages, supporting visualization of geospatial data.

tools.name: WorldWindAndroid
tools.one_line_profile: NASA WorldWind Android SDK
tools.detailed_description: The NASA WorldWind Java SDK for Android, enabling the development of 3D virtual globe applications for mobile devices to visualize Earth science data.

tools.name: ocgis
tools.one_line_profile: OpenClimateGIS for CF-compliant climate datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing geoprocessing and calculation tools specifically designed for CF-compliant climate datasets, facilitating climate data analysis.

tools.name: motif
tools.one_line_profile: Pattern-based spatial analysis in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for pattern-based spatial analysis, allowing for the description and comparison of spatial patterns in categorical raster data.

tools.name: spData
tools.one_line_profile: Datasets for spatial analysis in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package containing diverse spatial datasets used for teaching and testing spatial analysis methods, serving as a standard data resource.

tools.name: PROJ
tools.one_line_profile: Cartographic Projections and Coordinate Transformations Library
tools.detailed_description: A standard Unix filter function and library for converting geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to another, fundamental to GIS software.

tools.name: GDAL
tools.one_line_profile: Translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats
tools.detailed_description: GDAL is a translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats that presents a single abstract data model to the calling application for all supported formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command-line utilities for data translation and processing.

tools.name: GRASS GIS
tools.one_line_profile: Free and open source geospatial processing engine
tools.detailed_description: GRASS (Geographic Resources Analysis Support System) is a free and open source Geographic Information System (GIS) software suite used for geospatial data management and analysis, image processing, graphics and maps production, spatial modeling, and visualization.

tools.name: libgeotiff
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reading and writing GeoTIFF information tags
tools.detailed_description: Libgeotiff is an open source library built on top of libtiff for reading and writing GeoTIFF information tags. It is a key component in the geospatial software stack for handling raster data metadata.

tools.name: Flex Projector
tools.one_line_profile: Software for creating custom world map projections
tools.detailed_description: Flex Projector is a software tool that allows cartographers and enthusiasts to create custom world map projections. It provides an interactive interface to modify projection parameters and visualize distortions.

tools.name: JMapProjLib
tools.one_line_profile: Java Map Projection Library
tools.detailed_description: JMapProjLib is a Java library for performing map projections. It supports various projection types and is designed for integration into Java-based geospatial applications.

tools.name: Adaptive Composite Map Projections
tools.one_line_profile: Library for creating adaptive composite map projections
tools.detailed_description: This library implements adaptive composite map projections, which combine several projections to minimize distortion across different regions or scales.

tools.name: PDAL
tools.one_line_profile: Point Data Abstraction Library for point cloud processing
tools.detailed_description: PDAL (Point Data Abstraction Library) is a C++ library for translating and manipulating point cloud data. It functions similarly to GDAL but for point cloud data (LiDAR, etc.), offering a pipeline architecture for data processing.

tools.name: Pandas-Bokeh
tools.one_line_profile: Bokeh plotting backend for Pandas and GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: Pandas-Bokeh provides a Bokeh plotting backend for Pandas, GeoPandas, and Pyspark DataFrames, enabling interactive plotting of geospatial and tabular data directly from DataFrames.

tools.name: esri2gpd
tools.one_line_profile: Scraper to convert ArcGIS Server REST API features to GeoDataFrame
tools.detailed_description: esri2gpd is a Python tool designed to scrape features from the ArcGIS Server REST API and return them as a geopandas GeoDataFrame, facilitating data acquisition from proprietary ESRI services into open science workflows.

tools.name: pyopf
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for working with Open Photogrammetry Format (OPF) projects
tools.detailed_description: pyopf is a Python library and set of tools designed to facilitate working with Pix4D's Open Photogrammetry Format (OPF) projects, enabling programmatic access and manipulation of photogrammetry project data.

tools.name: Projection Wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Map projection selection tool
tools.detailed_description: Projection Wizard is a web-based tool (and underlying logic) that helps cartographers select the most appropriate map projection for their specific map extent and distortion properties.

tools.name: UAVProduct
tools.one_line_profile: UAV image processing pipeline for geometric correction and point cloud generation
tools.detailed_description: UAVProduct is a C++ based tool for processing UAV imagery. It utilizes OpenMVG, OpenMVS, and GDAL to perform tasks such as image geometric correction, image stitching, and point cloud generation.

tools.name: geoplot
tools.one_line_profile: High-level geospatial data visualization library for Python
tools.detailed_description: Geoplot is a high-level Python geospatial plotting library. It is an extension to cartopy and matplotlib which makes mapping easy, providing a high-level interface for creating various types of geospatial visualizations.

tools.name: Rfast
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of fast R functions for data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Rfast is a collection of R functions for data analysis and statistics, implemented in C++ to achieve high performance. It covers a wide range of statistical methods and utility functions.

tools.name: Rfast2
tools.one_line_profile: Complementary collection of fast R functions for data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Rfast2 is a continuation/complement to the Rfast package, providing additional high-performance functions for data analysis and statistics in R.

tools.name: H3NET
tools.one_line_profile: Hexagonal Hierarchical Geo-spatial Indexing System in C#
tools.detailed_description: H3NET is a C# port/implementation of the H3 hexagonal hierarchical geospatial indexing system, allowing for efficient spatial indexing and analysis using hexagonal grids.

tools.name: Stereopy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for spatial transcriptomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: Stereopy is a comprehensive toolkit for spatial transcriptomics analysis. It provides functions for data reading, preprocessing, clustering, and visualization of spatial gene expression data.

tools.name: geopatra
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Maps with Geopandas
tools.detailed_description: Geopatra is a Python library that wraps Geopandas to provide easy-to-use interactive mapping capabilities, integrating with libraries like Folium and Kepler.gl.

tools.name: YiShape-Math
tools.one_line_profile: Java math library for vector operations, statistics, and ML
tools.detailed_description: YiShape-Math is a Java math library providing NumPy-like functionalities, including vector and matrix operations, statistics, optimization, signal processing, and machine learning models, suitable for scientific computing in Java.

tools.name: Sen2Agri-System
tools.one_line_profile: Sentinel-2 for Agriculture software system
tools.detailed_description: Sen2Agri is a software system designed to process high-resolution satellite images (specifically Sentinel-2 and Landsat 8) for agricultural monitoring purposes, such as crop type mapping and vegetation status monitoring.

tools.name: omicverse
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for multi-omics analysis including bulk, single-cell, and spatial RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library designed for multi-omics data analysis. It supports bulk RNA-seq, single-cell RNA-seq, and spatial transcriptomics, providing tools for data processing, visualization, and inference in biological research.

tools.name: peridetic
tools.one_line_profile: Precise and fast Geographic/Cartesian coordinate transformations library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ header-only implementation for simple, precise, accurate, and fast coordinate transformations between Geographic and Cartesian systems, suitable for geodesy and GIS applications.

tools.name: TerriaJS
tools.one_line_profile: Library for building rich, web-based geospatial 2D & 3D data platforms
tools.detailed_description: A framework for constructing web-based geospatial catalogs and visualization platforms. It supports both 2D and 3D map views and is used to build national-scale digital twin and data portal applications.

tools.name: OpenAthena-Legacy-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Geodetic location spotting tool for common drones
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows common drones to identify precise geodetic locations from imagery, useful for photogrammetry and search-and-rescue operations.

tools.name: TileStache
tools.one_line_profile: Map tile caching and serving server
tools.detailed_description: A server application for caching and serving map tiles. It supports various providers and projection systems, facilitating the distribution of geospatial raster and vector data.

tools.name: Fiona
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for reading and writing geographic data files
tools.detailed_description: Fiona is designed to be a simple, clean, and Pythonic interface to the OGR library, focusing on reading and writing vector data formats like Shapefiles and GeoJSON.

tools.name: fio-buffer
tools.one_line_profile: Fiona CLI plugin for buffering geometries
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface plugin for Fiona that performs geometry buffering operations in parallel using Shapely, enhancing vector data processing workflows.

tools.name: rtree
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial indexing library for Python GIS
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for libspatialindex, providing advanced spatial indexing capabilities (R-Tree) essential for efficient spatial queries and GIS operations.

tools.name: raster_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RMRS Raster Utility Project for geospatial analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of raster processing utilities developed by the USDA Forest Service Rocky Mountain Research Station (RMRS) for ecological and geospatial analysis.

tools.name: python-awips
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for querying AWIPS meteorological datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for interacting with EDEX Data Servers to query and retrieve meteorological data from the Advanced Weather Interactive Processing System (AWIPS).

tools.name: UrbanMapper
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial join and enrichment tool for urban layers
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to streamline urban analysis by providing spatial join and enrichment capabilities for urban datasets, featuring Scikit-Learn-like pipelines for integration into data science workflows.

tools.name: cog_worker
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable analysis tool for Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs)
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed for performing scalable, arbitrary analysis on Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs, enabling efficient processing of large-scale raster datasets in cloud environments.

tools.name: WorldWindExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: 3D virtual globe geo-browser app framework
tools.detailed_description: A web-based 3D virtual globe application framework built on WorldWindJS, allowing for the visualization of terrain, imagery, and celestial data.

tools.name: bento-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for subcellular analysis of spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for analyzing spatial transcriptomics data at the subcellular level, enabling the study of RNA localization and spatial organization within cells.

tools.name: Changen

tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool and Python library designed to extract and convert OpenStreetMap (OSM) data into various geospatial file formats for analysis and mapping.

tools.name: ggalt

tools.detailed_description: An R package that extends 'ggplot2' with additional coordinate systems, geometries, and statistical transformations, enhancing capabilities for scientific and statistical visualization.

tools.name: ceramic
tools.one_line_profile: R tool to load and cache map tiles using GDAL
tools.detailed_description: An R package that simplifies downloading and caching map tiles from image servers directly into geospatial objects using GDAL, facilitating background mapping and spatial context.

tools.name: gdalio
tools.one_line_profile: R helpers for GDAL warping and data access
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing helper functions and wrappers for GDAL operations, particularly focused on efficient data warping and reading of geospatial rasters.

tools.name: gpdvega

tools.detailed_description: A Python library that connects GeoPandas dataframes with Altair declarative visualization, enabling seamless charting of geospatial data.

tools.name: SpatialCL

tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for high-performance spatial indexing and processing of particle data in 2D and 3D using OpenCL, suitable for scientific simulations and HPC applications.

tools.name: geobr
tools.one_line_profile: Access to official spatial data sets of Brazil
tools.detailed_description: An R and Python package that provides easy access to official spatial datasets of Brazil (e.g., census tracts, municipalities) for geospatial analysis and research.

tools.name: geojson

tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing bindings and utilities for processing GeoJSON, a standard format for encoding a variety of geographic data structures. It supports encoding and decoding of geometry and feature collections.

tools.name: WhiteboxTools
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced geospatial data analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: A command-line program and library for advanced geospatial data analysis. It contains hundreds of tools for processing geospatial data, including hydrological analysis, LiDAR processing, and geomorphometric analysis.

tools.name: spatialEco

tools.detailed_description: An R package providing utilities for spatial data analysis and modelling of ecological systems. It includes functions for spatial smoothing, polygon manipulation, and landscape metrics.

tools.name: GeoWombat
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for large-scale geospatial raster data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing large-scale geospatial raster data, leveraging Xarray and Dask for parallel processing. It simplifies tasks like radiometric correction, mosaicking, and classification.

tools.name: CellChat
tools.one_line_profile: Inference and analysis of cell-cell communication
tools.detailed_description: An R toolkit for inference, visualization, and analysis of cell-cell communication from single-cell and spatially resolved transcriptomics data. It models communication probability and identifies signaling patterns.

tools.name: Map-Projections
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of programs for creating custom map projections
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based suite of programs designed to create custom maps of the Earth's surface using various map projection algorithms. It allows users to experiment with and visualize different cartographic projections.

tools.name: interpies
tools.one_line_profile: Geophysical data analysis and transformation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python functions for reading, displaying, transforming, and analyzing geophysical data, particularly potential field data (magnetic and gravity).

tools.name: shapefile2gif
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to create animated GIFs from time-annotated shapefiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that automatically creates animated GIFs illustrating the dynamics of time-annotated vector objects (e.g., building footprints) from a shapefile.

tools.name: pyroSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for large-scale SAR satellite data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for large-scale processing of Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellite data. It provides handlers for various SAR data formats and interfaces with processing tools like SNAP and GAMMA.

tools.name: geopandas_osm
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to query OSM Overpass API into GeoDataFrames
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that allows querying the OpenStreetMap (OSM) Overpass API and retrieving the results directly as GeoPandas GeoDataFrames, facilitating the integration of OSM data into GIS workflows.

tools.name: Pyqtree

tools.detailed_description: A pure Python implementation of a quad tree spatial index for GIS or rendering usage. It allows for efficient spatial querying and storage of 2D data.

tools.name: urban-geo-big-data-3d

tools.detailed_description: A tool enabling the visualization, query, and processing of multidimensional vector and raster geospatial data related to urban areas on the Web. It supports 3D visualization of urban environments.

tools.name: road_regularization

tools.detailed_description: A Python utility designed to process OpenStreetMap road network data. It performs batch conversion of multi-lines to single lines, detects and exports dead-end roads, divides parcels, and optimizes road network topology for downstream geospatial analysis and cartography.

tools.name: SRAI

tools.detailed_description: A Python library focused on creating spatial embeddings and representations for geospatial machine learning tasks. It provides tools to download data from OSM, split areas into regions (H3, S2, etc.), and generate embeddings for downstream AI4S tasks.

tools.name: naip-cogeo-mosaic

tools.detailed_description: A Python toolset to create and serve high-resolution aerial imagery map tiles from Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs) of the National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP). It facilitates access to large-scale remote sensing datasets.

tools.name: usgs-topo-tiler
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for USGS Historical Topographic Map tiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to read and serve Web Mercator map tiles directly from USGS Historical Topographic Maps (GeoTIFFs). It enables integration of historical topography data into modern geospatial workflows.

tools.name: scimap
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Single-Cell Analysis Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A scalable toolkit for analyzing spatial molecular data (spatial transcriptomics/proteomics). It performs preprocessing, phenotyping, spatial clustering, and interaction analysis to understand tissue architecture.

tools.name: pyoints
tools.one_line_profile: Processing library for point clouds, voxels and rasters
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for handling and processing geospatial point cloud data (LiDAR), voxel grids, and raster data. It provides algorithms for interpolation, transformation, and analysis of 3D spatial data.

tools.name: docker-lambda
tools.one_line_profile: GDAL-enabled Docker images for AWS Lambda
tools.detailed_description: A set of Docker images and layers optimized for running GDAL and other geospatial libraries in AWS Lambda environment. It serves as critical infrastructure for serverless geospatial data processing workflows.

tools.name: Spatial4j
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial library for Java
tools.detailed_description: A core Java library for geospatial data handling, providing support for shapes, distance calculations, and coordinate reference systems. It is widely used as a dependency in scientific software (e.g., Lucene/Solr, Elasticsearch) for spatial indexing and operations.

tools.name: go-gdal

tools.detailed_description: A Go programming language wrapper for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL). It allows Go developers to utilize GDAL's extensive capabilities for reading and writing raster and vector geospatial data formats.

tools.name: MAPS

tools.detailed_description: A machine learning pipeline for analyzing spatial proteomics data. It is designed to uncover spatial relationships and patterns in biological tissues, supporting research in spatial biology and pathology.

tools.detailed_description: A library for performing spatial analysis on raster data using xarray. It implements common geospatial algorithms (slope, aspect, viewshed, proximity, zonal statistics) and is optimized for performance using Numba, integrating well with the PyData scientific stack.

tools.name: opengxt

tools.name: mapnik-vector-tile

tools.name: pyrosm

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reading OpenStreetMap (OSM) data from Protocol Buffer (PBF) files into GeoPandas GeoDataFrames. It is optimized for speed and memory efficiency.

tools.name: esda
tools.one_line_profile: Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis (ESDA), providing statistics for spatial autocorrelation (Moran's I, Geary's C) and other spatial patterns. Part of the PySAL ecosystem.

tools.name: libpysal
tools.one_line_profile: Core components of PySAL
tools.detailed_description: The core library of the Python Spatial Analysis Library (PySAL) ecosystem, providing basic spatial data structures (weights, graphs) and file I/O functionality.

tools.name: PySAL
tools.one_line_profile: Python Spatial Analysis Library meta-package
tools.detailed_description: A meta-package for the Python Spatial Analysis Library (PySAL) ecosystem, aggregating various modules for spatial analysis, econometrics, and visualization.

tools.name: scikit-gmsh

tools.detailed_description: A Python interface to Gmsh, allowing for the generation of 3D finite element meshes using a scikit-style API. Useful for physics simulations and modeling.

tools.name: sf

tools.name: Rasters.jl

tools.name: EOmaps

tools.name: rasterio

tools.name: eodatadown
